sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const LiquidGlassButton = ({ children, className = "", variant = "default", ...props }) => { const baseClasses = "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-2xl text-sm font-semibold transition-all duration-500 relative overflow-hidden group"; const variants = { default: "backdrop-blur-2xl bg-slate-900/20 border border-slate-200/30 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-900/30 shadow-xl hover:shadow-2xl hover:scale-105 active:scale-95", primary: "backdrop-blur-2xl bg-blue-600/20 border border-blue-400/30 text-blue-900 hover:bg-blue-600/30 shadow-xl hover:shadow-2xl hover:scale-105 active:scale-95", liquid: "backdrop-blur-2xl bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500/20 via-pink-500/20 to-blue-500/20 border border-white/30 text-white hover:from-purple-500/30 hover:via-pink-500/30 hover:to-blue-500/30 shadow-xl hover:shadow-2xl hover:scale-105 active:scale-95" }; return ( <motion.button className={`${baseClasses} ${variants[variant]} ${className}`} whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }} whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }} {...props} > {children} </motion.button> ); }; export { LiquidGlassButton };
